div.div:
xanthinealkaloid - April 10, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy S with version 1.2.14
Thanks
Best unit conversion app in the market, and it keeps getting better!

EVE - April 10, 2012 - Version 1.2.14
Absolutely BRILLIANT
Great, useful app, very very nice user interface, personally never had any bugs or force closes, plus developer very helpful & responsive. Highly recommended!!!

saint satin stain - June 23, 2012 - LG myTouch Q with version 1.2.14
I don't say awesome, fantastic, I just say
it's well written, designed, and intuitive to use. It replaced two (three is you count its free version) on my phone. I had a calculator app, a temperature conversion app, and unit converter free. It has the right features for me, one that stands out is the start up selection; you may choose to start with conversions, calculators (simple, general calculator, tip calculator, or Paypal fee calculator), or favorites. I don't generally like tool suites, they often have unnecessary features, bloat one doesn't use. This one is exceptional; it even includes the capability of hiding conversions you may not need. The free version could have done most of the operations I needed, but the added features of the paid version I can use, will use, and also paying is a way of saying Thank You to someone I probably won't meet to shake his hand. Try the free version, you'll like it; if you don't upgrade at least say thank you in a review. Wopnersoft gal or guy, I owe you a handshake and a Pilsner or lemonade.

Aerion - April 10, 2012 - HTC Desire HD with version 1.2.14
You name it, it converts it
Incredibly comprehensive conversion tool, with a clean, easy to use interface. Top app!

Kurisu - May 15, 2012 - HTC Sensation 4G with version 1.2.14
Fantastic
Purchased to show my support! Thank you. Great application, if you use the standard version as much as myself, buy without hesitation!.

Rob - May 30, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy S2 with version 1.2.14
Great
Was perfectly happy with free version but have purchased this to support developer. This version even better, thanks.

An easy 5 stars!

The greatest app dev on the market. I had to buy the plus. The dev even responds to my.questions even when its 1:18am in the morning. He's the best.

This unit converter is very nice because it has everything in just one small apps. :) keep up.

Steis
Very useful and configurable with Favorites. Would be handy to have additional conversion variables available in a Favorite to allow for further manipulation of the result. Worth upgrading to Plus.

wug - June 19, 2011 - Dell Streak with version 1.2.9
Traditional Hong Kong weights!
Thank you! Now the classic Sam Hui song 半斤八兩 (Half kan, eight leung) makes perfect sense, at least in weight conversion. ;)

R.J. - November 18, 2011 - Version 1.2.9
Best unit converter app...
Best unit converter app on the Android Market by far. There's practically a conversion for every kind of unit for every type and the user interface looks awesome. If you're like me and have purchased All Converter Pro and/or gUnit (full version) and felt that those weren't as what you expected, then look no further, this app will replace both of those completely and then some! ;)
